sentences.en: A 19 th century French movement that rejected realism and expre ed subjective visio through evocative images.
sentences.cn: 产生于19世纪的法国艺术运动.它摒弃现实主义手法,通过使人产生联想的意像表达主观感受.

sentences.en: Deathly Hallows is a wonderfully evocative - without - telling - us - much title; one that can only leave us enthralled in speculation.
sentences.cn: DeathlyHallows这个题目巧妙地吸引我们却又不向我们透漏太多线索, 只让我们在无尽的猜测中徘徊.

sentences.en: Epic in and beautifully evocative and place, Woman in Bronze reveals a life lived in extremes.
sentences.cn: 《青铜女子像》以史诗般意境,完美再现历史, 揭露了一种极端的生活状态.

sentences.en: Her story is sharply evocative of Italian provincial life.
sentences.cn: 她的故事让人清晰地回忆起意大利的乡村生活。

sentences.en: His talk was evocative of the bygone days.
sentences.cn: 他的谈话令人回忆起往昔的时日.

sentences.en: Painterly and evocative of wind and cold, beauty of the starkness of the buildings'perseverance.
sentences.cn: 如画般的,引人共鸣和遐想的风和寒冷.建筑所饱含的令人惊异的美.

sentences.en: Since the late 1980 s , Alio Die has recorded deep, evocative experimental ambient and electro - acoustic soundscapes.
sentences.cn: 1980年代后期, 他开始录制深邃而且具有启迪性的实验氛围音乐和电子音响.

sentences.en: That smell is evocative of school.
sentences.cn: 这种气味使人回想起学校来.

sentences.en: The music so produced is sometimes powerful and evocative.
sentences.cn: 这样产生的音乐有时很有力量,并且有感召力.

sentences.en: The perfume was evocative of spring.
sentences.cn: 那种香味令人想起了春天.

sentences.en: The taste of the cakes was evocative of my childhood.
sentences.cn: 这些蛋糕的味道唤起了我对童年的回忆.

sentences.en: These sentences have a variety of evocative and expressive function.
sentences.cn: 这类句子具有丰富的语气表达功能、多样的情态传达功能.

sentences.en: Those old toys are evocative of my boyhood.
sentences.cn: 这些旧玩具唤起我对童年的回忆.

sentences.en: Those toys are evocative of my childhood.
sentences.cn: 这些玩具唤起我对童年的回忆.

trans.tran_en: making people remember something by producing a feeling or memory in them
